name: Gwerddonau Llion
description:
Gwerddonau Llion is a setting inspired by Welsh mythology and is an upcoming submission for the Fallen RPG Jam.

The setting is under construction and this page will be updated as I continue to develop it. The eventual cost of the setting will be £4.95 and will move to this price when I'm satisfied that it is worth the money.

The bestiary currently contains six types of faeries native to the islands for use with your Fallen games.
